# EnumerableExtensions.ToObservableCollection&lt;T&gt; method

Creates a new observable collection from an IEnumerable.

```csharp
public static ObservableCollection<T> ToObservableCollection<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type of enumeeration. |

## Return Value

An new ObservableCollection typed from IEnumerable.
